answers.answer: If I were yu I would call my doctor...it may not be anything to worry about but headache can be a sign of preeclampsia

I m 26weeks as well... its mostly growing baby... i have been to midwife today for pelvic pain i was told baby was laying low... and been changing position.. at this stage baby is getting heavier which cause many pains such as back pain and when baby press on your nerves it can cause numbness and pain in ribs and legs... i get that a lot especially in middle of the night... getting out breadth is due to lungs getting squashed...if ur head aches are becoming severe then you should go to doctor as this what my midwife said me to do if i bleed or loose amniotic fluid or start getting severe headaches i should go to hospital in emergency...
I wouldn't ignore a headache that won't go away with blurred vision. This could be toxemia. Please phone your OB ASAP.

question: hey ladys i have had a sore head 24hours pain killers dont work! when i do something simple my head pulsatesmy legs go numb at the top and my lower back is sorewhen i walk or climb stairs i get out of breathmy eyes are nipping and sometimes if not all the time eyes are blurry  (dont no if this is the sore head cozing it )wee'ing alot and feel some what pressure/pelvic painunder neeth my breast/ribs are sore alsohope you can help me out
title: 26 weeks bad sore head and blury vison
